sys:positions.title: President

sys:positions.organization: Federation of Nepalese Chamber of Commerce and Industry
sys:positions.title: President

description: Padma Jyoti Kansakar is a Nepalese industrialist and politician. Trained in management and technology, he is the former chairman of Jyoti Group of Companies and was the president of the Federation of Nepalese Chamber of Commerce and Industry. He was elected president of the South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation Chambers of Commerce and Industry (SCCI) in 2002. He holds a degree from MIT.
short_description: Nepalese industrialist and politician, former chairman of the Jyoti Group of Companies.
